results.name: Self-inverse permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, for even n, a(n) = A250469(1+a(n/2)), for odd n, a(n) = 2*a(A268674(n)-1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3165
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
